issue.title: [Ruby] Can't update red-arrow on windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9566](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9566). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Can't update to latest arrow on windows installed with msys2.  


Dominic E Sisneros@F001257106 MSYS ~
$ pacman -Ss arrow
mingw32/mingw-w64-i686-arrow 0.17.1-1
    Apache Arrow is a cross-language development platform for in-memory data (mingw-w64)
mingw64/mingw-w64-x86_64-arrow 0.17.1-1 [installed]
    Apache Arrow is a cross-language development platform for in-memory data (mingw-w64)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9566?focusedCommentId=17166021) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Could you wait for updating MSYS2 packages?
Apache Arrow 1.0.0 update has been merged: https://github.com/msys2/MINGW-packages/pull/6716

It will be shipped when the next MSYS2 package update. You can see updated MSYS2 packages at https://packages.msys2.org/updates .

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9566?focusedCommentId=17459482) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
The Apache Arrow GLib package on MSYS2 has been updated.
